name: VR Zombie Project
description:
ZOMBIE SURVIVAL SHOOTER for the META/OCULUS QUEST featuring an intense ENDLESS HORDE MODE, how many waves can you survive?

Future updates will include improved textures and new environments. Also ZOMBIE FIRING RANGE a game mode in development

Combining my love for Zombie Survival Shooters, and my knowledge from the Unity Learn Courses – Create with Code & VR. I set out to create this Zombie Endless Horde Shooter, A VR Microgame showcasing my personal technical skills in a familiar format for the average gamer.
